resources.string:
This application is the final project of the course "App Development for Android Smartphones" at the OTH Regensburg. It's built using only basic Android and support library features. The displayed events are queried using the linked events API provided by the city of Helsinki. 
 
 

The app implements all features from the specification: 
 

1)	 Keyword based search 

2)	 Autocomplete in search 

3)	 Custom adapters 

4)	 Detailed information about events 

5)	 Show event location on a map 

6)	 Show images of the event 

7)	 Use pagination of the API to display all elements 

8)	 Show a splash screen with the developer's name 

9)	 Contains an About activity
